short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover $RUG balances for any Rug Radio Genesis NFT directly on OpenSea.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is an unofficial plugin created by @WinzyNFT. 

After installing, when you visit the listing for any Rug Radio Genesis NFT (eg. https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x8ff1523091c9517bc328223d50b52ef450200339/8487), you will see the balance right under the owner of the NFT.
